name: COVENET
description: COVENET enables you to track your own fitness using your phones step counter. You can create a group of fitness buddies. A fitness buddy could be your friend or a relative who needs an extra push from you to achieve his/her fitness goals. Your buddies can do the same for you too!  Thinking About You feature lets you share special moments with a Special Someone if she or he is a Titan WE watch user. She can send special message directly from her watch to you by the press of a button. You can also add aSpecial Someone directly in the app. Explore the feature to know more.  Become a Guardian or a Safety Contact of a Titan WE watch user. Guardians and Safety Contacts are part of the Titan WE users safety network which is alerted if the user triggers an SOS from the watch. Guardianscan see the SOS users location and that of Safety Contacts. A Guardian can take certain actions such as alert Police, call nearby Safety Contacts, or drive to the SOS user location. Safety Contacts can be contacted by Guardians for help. If you have been added as a Guardian or a Safety Contact, experience the feature in TRY mode with the Titan WE user.
